categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tyler Thello was a Human male Jedi Knight who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. Shortly before the Galactic War, at the request of Jedi Battlemaster Jun Seros, Tyler worked with Agent Dhal of the Republic Strategic Information Service in an effort to capture the bounty hunter responsible for the deaths of Jedi Master Kellian Jarro and his Padawan Thendys Noori, and for the destruction of the Republic vessel Aurora. The bounty hunter was lured into a trap on the planet Quesh by Dhal, and Thello led a strike team to capture the hunter, but the hunter killed Thello and the strike team and escaped.

Tyler Thello appears as an enemy in the Bounty Hunter class mission "Endorsement" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. If players spared Thendys Noori, she will appear in Thello's place, but as the Bounty Hunter is an Imperial class and thus assumed to make the dark side choices, Thello is assumed to be present on Quesh.
